description:
Hugh is Ransom's cousin who was in a financial tight spot, and Ransom's been such a great model for me I figured I would give his relative a try.
He definitely has the whole "rough trade" going on with the prison-ish tattoos, but most are all of the homemade variety.
Hugh has the same attitude towards sex that Ransom does. (though he has a lot more kids than Ransom! 5 and 1 more on the way!). He will just go with the flow as long as someone is paying attention to his cock OR enjoying whatever it is he is doing.
I wasn't real happy with his hair, so we shaved it off for his upcoming Serviced video, that I actually did (I know, it's been a while). I too have to face the receding hairline and go super short with it. Own it man! LOL
As for Hugh's Serviced vieo, Ransom wanted me to do the honors as I think he and Hugh messed around as kids and even as adults were in close proximity when action was going down. He knew Hugh would get off to a more mature guy taking control.
Hugh isn't for everyone. He is very quiet, but loves to laugh, polite, and def. likes to play with his over-sized uncut cock.
The kid can squirt I mighty big load too!
title: Hugh - Solo
